casebody.data:
YARRELL
v.
GRIFFIN. No. 407P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC/Griffin.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of August 2007 by Plaintiff for "Notice of Appeal":

*881"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2007."
